results.description: Rob Howley has "gone through hell" since being suspended for an alleged breach of World Rugby betting rules, says Warren Gatland.
results.title: Rob Howley: Warren Gatland says ex-Wales backs coach has been 'through hell'

results.description: Jonathan Davies i fethu'r Chwe Gwlad a Rhys Patchell allan am fisoedd oherwydd anafiadau a gawson nhw yng Nghwpan Rygbi'r Byd.
results.shortTitle: Jon Davies a Patchell allan am fisoedd
results.title: Jonathan Davies a Rhys Patchell allan am fisoedd ag anafiadau

results.description: A first Rugby World Cup in the Americas could take place in the United States in 2031, with Australia emerging as a prime contender to host in 2027.
results.shortTitle: USA could host 2031 Rugby World Cup
results.title: Rugby World Cup: USA set to host 2031, Australia leads 2027 race

results.description: Handre Pollard misses the start of the South Africa's victory tour because he is in hospital with a fractured eye socket.
results.title: Handre Pollard watches South Africa victory tour from hospital

results.description: Scottish Rugby is fined, reprimanded and ordered to apologise for Mark Dodson's criticism of World Rugby over a possible cancellation of their World Cup game with Japan.
results.title: Rugby World Cup: Scottish Rugby fined £70,000 for Mark Dodson legal threat and criticism

results.description: Ireland out-half Johnny Sexton says it will take 'a long time' to move past the nation's disappointing World Cup exit at the hands of New Zealand in Japan.
results.shortTitle: RWC exit hard to get over - Sexton
results.title: Johnny Sexton: Ireland fly-half says it will take 'a long time' to get over World Cup exit

results.description: South Africa's World Cup-winning prop Tendai Mtawarira announces his retirement from international rugby aged 34.
results.title: Tendai Mtawarira: South Africa prop retires from internationals after World Cup

results.description: 日本の躍進に国中が沸き、南アフリカの優勝に多くの人が感動した。ラグビーW杯日本大会は、スポーツに何ができるのかを示した大会となった。
results.title: 【美土路の見どころ】 ラグビーの可能性示した南アフリカ ＝ W杯日本大会を振り返って

results.description: Springboks captain Siya Kolisi says their World Cup triumph was "for all South Africans" as squad are greeted by thousands of fans.
results.shortTitle: World Cup win 'for all South Africans'
results.title: Siya Kolisi: Rugby World Cup win for all South Africans, says Springboks captain

results.description: As Warren Gatland's 12-year tenure ends, new Wales coach Wayne Pivac has a tough act to follow, but firm foundations to build on.
results.shortTitle: After Gatland... Follow that, Mr Pivac
results.title: Wales coach Wayne Pivac inherits quality and expectation from Warren Gatland

results.description: 「今回の優勝は、1995年の初優勝を超える大きな意味がある」。ラグビーワールドカップ（W杯）日本大会における南アフリカの優勝を、初優勝時の主将だったフランソワ・ピーナール氏はそう評する。
results.title: 【ラグビーW杯】 黒人主将チームの優勝は「大きな意義」　南ア元主将が賛辞

results.description: Brilliant tries, a devastating typhoon, wonderful fans and Owen Farrell's haka stare - the 2019 World Cup had more than its fair share of unforgettable moments.
results.title: Rugby World Cup 2019: Memorable moments from Japan

thumbnail.altText: Jake Ball and Faf de Klerk

results.description: 「これまでで最も素晴らしい大会」。2日に閉幕したラグビーワールドカップ（W杯）日本大会を、国際統括団体ワールドラグビーが高く評価した。
results.title: 【ラグビーW杯】 日本大会は「過去最高のW杯」　統括団体会長

results.description: Former Springbok captain Francois Pienaar says the 2019 team's Rugby World Cup triumph eclipses his sides' success in 1995
results.title: Rugby World Cup: South Africa's 2019 win is bigger than 1995 - Francois Pienaar

results.description: Rugby greats including Francois Pienaar, Richie McCaw and Bryan Habana sum up Wales's record-breaking lock and captain Alun Wyn Jones.
results.title: Alun Wyn Jones: Rugby greats pay tribute to Wales's 'leader, legend, father figure'

results.description: Japan 2019 will be remembered as "probably the greatest Rugby World Cup" in the tournament's 32-year history says World Rugby Chairman Sir Bill Beaumont.
results.shortTitle: 'Japan 2019 may be best World Cup ever'
results.title: Rugby World Cup: Sir Bill Beaumont hails Japan 2019 as 'probably greatest' ever

results.description: Former England fly-half Paul Grayson rates each player's performance in the final and contribution during the World Cup.
results.title: England: Player ratings for Rugby World Cup campaign in Japan

results.description: ラグビーワールドカップ（W杯）日本大会は2日、決勝があり、南アフリカ（世界3位）が王座を獲得した。イングランド（同1位）と横浜国際総合競技場（横浜市）で対決し、32－12で勝利した。
results.title: 【ラグビーW杯】 南アフリカ、3回目の優勝　イングランドは及ばず

results.description: South Africa captain Siya Kolisi hopes winning the World Cup in Japan will "inspire every kid" back home.
results.shortTitle: I want to inspire every kid - Kolisi
results.title: Rugby World Cup final: Captain Siya Kolisi wants to 'inspire every kid' in South Africa

results.description: South Africa captain Siya Kolisi lifting the Webb Ellis Cup felt like something changing forever, writes BBC Sport chief sports writer Tom Fordyce.
results.title: Siya Kolisi and South Africa's triumph 'a story to inspire far beyond the rugby pitch'
